ml.alternet.scan

Class TrackableReaderScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.scan.Scanner
      • ml.alternet.scan.ReaderScanner
        • ml.alternet.scan.TrackableReaderScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Trackable

    public class TrackableReaderScanner
extends ReaderScanner
implements Trackable
    A scanner that tracks the current line and column.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

        Overrides:

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
            throws IOException
        Cancel the current mark. The previous column and line are restored.
        Overrides:

      • consume

        public void consume()
             throws IOException
